VU Meter

Wskaźnik wysterowania sygnału audio

About the project

Short vacation projection purely analogue. Audio meter. Project based on LM3915, PNP transistors and LED strips. Very simple but with interesting visual effect. More photos and videos will be added soon.

The final appearance of the device

By Mateusz Janus
